title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 180-3.24 - Visits by OCFS Staff and Other Officials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 180-3.24 - Visits by OCFS Staff and Other Officials

State Regulations
(a) A specialized secure detention facility
shall allow OCFS officials and agency representatives, including staff of OCFS
Office of the Ombudsman (OCFS Ombudsman), to visit and inspect all areas of a
specialized secure detention facility, inspect facility records, and speak
confidentiality to youth. (b) Such
visits may be announced or unannounced. (c) A specialized secure detention facility
shall permit Youth Part judges or their designees to visit the facility, interview youth and review records, as they may deem appropriate. Notes
